page.title: 14CAMPTON CLAY TARGETS
page.content: {Peacock Clay targets}are the oldest firm in the industry producing and selling their own product. The firm was founded in 1954 by Mr Edward Thomas Peacock from an idea to make clay pigeons for his own use. After two years of experiment,many burnt fingers and blisters , a machine was built to make clay pigeons of saleable quality. Over the years they have developed other types of clays,mainly for sporting shooting.In 1960 the first clay rabbit was produced and 1966 saw the first mini targets, now called 60mm. The battue went into production in 1983. They have supplied targets to all the National Championships so far this season.The latest being the English Sporting to be held at Taverham, Norwich , in July.
